subject: Tennis
Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal finally beat Novak Djokovic after seven consecutive losses in finals, thrashing him on clay, 6-3, 6-1, to win the Monte Carlo Masters for the eighth consecutive year.
snippet: Rafael Nadal finally beat Novak Djokovic after seven consecutive losses in finals, thrashing him on clay, 6-3, 6-1, to win the Monte Carlo Masters for the eighth consecutive year.
